about_the_game:
House Full of Cats invites you into a delightful world of hand-drawn whimsy, where curiosity leads to discovery, and every corner holds a feline surprise!

In this charming hidden object game, your mission is simple but captivating: explore a beautifully illustrated home brimming with coziness and warmth as you search for all the playful, sneaky cats hiding throughout. Each room is packed with charming details, inviting you to slow down and take in the artistic beauty as you hunt for your elusive furry friends.

Key Features:

  • Whimsical Hand-Drawn Art: Enjoy lovingly crafted illustrations filled with charm and heart.

  • Cat-Finding Fun: Discover mischievous cats hiding under pillows, behind furniture, or in unexpected spots!

  • Cozy Atmosphere: Perfect for when you want to relax and unwind with lighthearted, wholesome gameplay.

  • Accessible for Everyone: Simple gameplay that anyone can pick up and enjoy.

  • 5 Levels

  • Unlimited Hints

  • Timer

  • Settings

Whether you're a seasoned cat lover or just enjoy charming, artistic adventures, House Full of Cats promises a playful and heartwarming experience that will leave you smiling. Dive in, get cozy, and start your cat-finding journey today!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Embark on a heartwarming hide-and-seek adventure in House Full of Cats! Explore beautifully hand-drawn, whimsical rooms filled with cozy charm as you hunt for adorable, mischievous cats tucked away in every nook and cranny. Can you find them all? Purrhaps!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Serbian
